Verses: 1 pozhudhu Vidindhavudane, Piradhaana Aasaariyarum Moopparum Vedhapaaragarum Aalosanai Sangaththaaranaivarum Koodi Aalosanaipanni, Yesuvaik Kattik Kondupoi, Pilaaththuvinidaththil Oppukkoduththaargal.
2 pilaaththu Avarai Nokki: Nee Yoodharudaiya Raajaavaa Endru Kettaan. Adharku Avar: Neer Sollugirapadithaan Endraar.
3 piradhaana Aasaariyargal Avarmel Anegankutrangalaich Saattinaargal. Avaro Maaruththaram Ondrum Sollavillai.
4 appozhudhu, Pilaaththu Marupadiyum Avarai Nokki: Idho, Ivargal Unmel Eththanaiyo Kutrangalaich Saattugiraargale, Adharku Nee Uththaravu Ondrum Sollugiradhillaiyaa Endru Kettaan.
5 yesuvo Appozhudhum Uththaravu Ondrum Sollavillai; Adhinaal Pilaaththu Aachchariyappattaan.
6 kaavalpannappattavargalil Evanai Viduthalaiyaakkavendumendru Janangal Kettukkolvaargalo, Avanai Avargalukkaaga Viduthalaiyaakkuvadhu Pandigaidhorum Pilaaththuvukku Vazhakkamaayirunthadhu.
7 kalagam Panni Andhak Kalagaththil Kolaiseydhu, Adharkaagak Kaaval Pannappattavargalil Parapaas Ennappatta Oruvan Irundhaan.
8 janangal, Vazhakkaththinpadiye Thangalukku Oruvanai Vidudhalaiyaakkavendumendru Saththamittuk Kettukkollaththodanginaargal.
9 poraamaiyinaale Piradhaana Aasaariyargal Avarai Oppukkoduththaargal Endru Pilaaththu Arindhu,
10 avargalai Nokki: Naan Yoodharudaiya Raajaavai Ungalukku Viduthalaiyaakkavendumendrirukkireergalaa Endru Kettaan.
11 parabaasaith Thangalukku Vidudhalaiyaakkavendumendru Janangal Kettukkollumpadi, Piradhaana Aasaariyargal Avargalai Evivittaargal.
12 pilaaththu Marupadiyum Avargalai Nokki: Appadiyaanaal Yoodharudaiya Raajaavendru Neengal Sollugiravanai Naan Enna Seyyavendum Endru Kettaan.
13 avanai Siluvaiyil Araiyum Endru Marupadiyum Saththamittu Sonnaargal.
14 adharkup Pilaaththu: En, Enna Pollaappuch Seydhaan Endraan. Avargalo: Avanai Siluvaiyil Araiyum Endru Pinnum Adhigamaaik Kookkuralittu Sonnaargal.
15 appozhudhu Pilaaththu Janangalai Piriyappaduththa Manadhullavanaai, Parabaasai Avargalukku Vidudhalaiyaakki, Yesuvaiyo Vaarinaal Adippiththu, Siluvaiyil Araiyumpadikku Oppukkoduththaan.
16 appozhudhu, Porchsevagar Avaraith Dhesaadhipadhiyin Aramanaiyaagiya Maaligaiyil Kondupoi, Avvidaththil Porchsevagarudaiya Koottamuzhuvadhaiyum Koodivarachseydhu,
17 sivappaana Melangiyai Avarukku Uduththi, Mulmudiyaip Pinni Avarukku Sootti:
18 yoodharudaiya Raajaave, Vaazhga Endru Avarai Vaazhththi,
19 avarai Sirasil Kolaal Adiththu, Avarmel Thuppi, Muzhangaalpadiyittu Avarai Vananginaargal.
20 avaraip Pariyaasampanninapinbu, Sivappaana Angiyaik Kazhatri, Avarudaiya Vasthirangalai Avarukku Uduththi, Avarai Siluvaiyil Araiyumpadi Veliye Konduponaargal.
21 sirene Ooraanum, Aleksandharukkum Rooppukkum Thagappanumaagiya Seemon Ennappatta Oruvan Naattilirundhu Avvazhiye Varugaiyil, Avarudaiya Siluvaiyai Sumakkumpadi Avanaip Balavandhampanninaargal.
22 kabaalasthalam Endru Arththankollum Kolkodhaa Ennum Idaththukku Avaraik Kondupoi,
23  Vellaippolam Kalandha Thiraatcharasaththai Avarukkuk Kudikkak Koduththaargal; Avar Adhai Etrukkollavillai.
24 appozhudhu Avarai Siluvaiyil Araindhaargal. Adhanpinbu, Avarudaiya Vasthirangalaip Pangittu, Ovvoruvan Ovvoru Pangai Eduththukkollumpadi Avaigalaikkuriththu Seettuppottaargal.
25 avarai Siluvaiyil Araindhapodhu Moondraam Manivelaiyaayirunthadhu.
26 avar Adaindha Aakkinaiyin Mugaandharaththaik Kaanbikkum Poruttu, Yoodharudaiya Raajaa Endru Ezhudhi, Siluvaiyin Mel Kattinaargal.
27 allaamalum, Avarudaiya Valadhu Pakkaththil Oruvanum Avarudaiya Idadhu Pakkaththil Oruvanumaaga, Irandu Kallarai Avarodekkooda Siluvaigalil Araindhaargal.
28 akkiramakkaararil Oruvanaaga Ennappattaar Engira Vedhavaakkiyam Adhanaale Niraiveritru.
29 andha Vazhiyaai Nadandhupogiravargal Thangal Thalaiyaith Thulukki: Aa! Aa! Dhevaalayaththai Idiththu, Moondru Naalaikkulle Kattugiravane,
30 unnai Neeye Ratchiththukkol; Siluvaiyilirundhirangivaa Endru Avaraith Dhooshiththaargal.
31 appadiye Piradhaana Aasaariyarum Vedhapaaragarum Thangalukkulle Pariyaasampanni: Matravargalai Ratchiththaan, Thannaiththaan Ratchiththukkollath Thiraaniyillai.

32 naam Kandu Visuvaasikkaththakkadhaaga Isravelukku Raajaavaagiya Kiristhu Ippozhudhu Siluvaiyilirunthirangattum Endru Sollikkondaargal. Avarodekooda Siluvaigalil Araiyappattavargalum Avarai Nindhiththaargal.
33 aaraammani Neramudhal Onbadhaammani Neramvaraikkum Boomiyengum Andhagaaram Undaayitru.
34 onbadhaammani Neraththile, Yesu: Eloyee! Eloyee! Laamaa Sabakthaani, Endru Migundha Saththamittuk Kooppittaar; Adharku: En Dhevane! En Dhevane! En Ennaik Kaivitteer Endru Arththamaam.
35 ange Nindravargalil Silar Adhaik Kettapozhudhu: Idho Eliyaavaik Kooppidugiraan Endraargal.
36 oruvan Odi, Kadarkaalaanaik Kaadiyile Thoiththu, Adhai Oru Kolil Maatti, Avarukkuk Kudikkak Koduththu: Porungal, Eliyaa Ivanai Irakka Varuvaano Paarppom Endraan.
37 yesu Magaa Saththamaaik Kooppittu, Jeevanai Vittaar.
38 appozhudhu, Dhevaalayaththin Thiraichseelai Melthodangik Keezhvaraikkum Irandaagak Kizhindhadhu.
39 avarukku Edhire Nindra Nootrukku Adhipadhi Avar Ippadik Kooppittu Jeevanai Vittadhaikkandapodhu: Meyyaagave Indha Manushan Dhevanudaiya Kumaaran Endraan.

40 sila Sthireegalum Dhooraththilirundhu Paarththukkondirundhaargal. Avar Galileyaavilirundhapodhu Avarukkup Pinsendru, Oozhiyanjseydhuvandha Magadhalenaa Mariyaalum, Sinna Yaakkobukkum Yosekkum Thaayaagiya Mariyaalum, Salome Enbavalum,
41 avarudanekooda Erusalemukku Vandhirundha Vere Anega Sthireegalum Avargalode Irundhaargal.
42 oivunaalukku Mundhina Naal Aayaththanaalaayirundhapadiyaal, Saayangaalamaanapodhu,

43 ganamporundhiya Aalosanaikkaaranum Arimaththiyaa Ooraanaanum Dhevanudaiya Raajyam Varak Kaaththirunthavanumaagiya Yoseppu Enbavan Vandhu, Pilaaththuvinidaththil Thunindhupoi, Yesuvin Sareeraththaik Kettaan.
44 avar Iththanai Seekkiraththil Mariththupponaaraa Endru Pilaaththu Aachchariyappattu, Nootrukku Adhipadhiyai Azhaippiththu: Avar Idharkulle Mariththadhu Nichchayamaa Endru Kettaan.
45 nootrukku Adhipadhiyinaale Adhai Arindhukondapinbu, Sareeraththai Yoseppinidaththil Koduththaan.

46 avan Poi, Melliya Dhuppattiyai Vaangikkonduvandhu, Avarai Irakki, Andhath Dhuppattiyile Sutri, Kanmalaiyil Vettiyirundha Kallaraiyile Avarai Vaiththu, Kallaraiyin Vaasalil Oru Kallaip Purattivaiththaan.
47 avarai Vaiththa Idaththai Magadhalenaa Mariyaalum, Yoseyin Thaayaagiya Mariyaalum Paarththaargal.
